QuestData.Title: The Evil Dragons of Un'Goro Crater
QuestData.Description: This crater is filled with a malignant breed of dragon. Have you seen them? They wander all about, parading their spiky backs and lizardy faces all around the Crater.$b$bDon't let them fool you, squire, for these dragons are no minions of graceful Alexstrasza. They are clearly vicious, and direly in need of a hero's blade.$b$bI have decided that I will slay no less than 15 of them. As my squire, you must come along. Should we become separated, you may meet me back here at the Hot Springs.
QuestData.CompletionText: I've not yet meted enough justice, squire. You may complain to me only when 15 of the beasts are slayed.
QuestData.RewardText: ...and that makes 15 of them.$b$bJustice had a name today... and that name was Maximillian of Northshire. For Doloria!
